column1: The S&P CNX Nifty closed at 4734.5 points on March 31, 2008 representing a fall of 489 pts points (9.36%), as compared to 5223.50 points on February 29, 2008. During the month of March 2008, S&P CNX Nifty touched a high of 5222.80 points on March 03, 2008 before closing at 4734.5 points on March 31, 2008. The market capitalisation of  S&P CNX Nifty decreased from Rs.3016694 crores on February 29, 2008 to Rs.2848773 crores on March 31, 2008, i.e. an decrease of Rs.167921 crores (5.56%).
* Beta & R2 are calculated for the period 01-Apr-2007 to 31-Mar-2008
* Beta measures the  degree to which any portfolio of stocks is affected as compared to the effect
on the market as a whole.
* The coefficient of determination (R2) measures the strength of relationship between two variables
the return on  a security versus that of the market.
* Volatility is the Std. deviation of the daily returns for the period 01-Mar-2008 to 31-Mar-2008
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is for a portfolio of Rs. 0.5 Crores
* Impact Cost for S&P CNX Nifty is the weightage average impact cost
